text:
One of the most exciting events of Quebec's
Winter Carnival was the ice canoe race.
This event is exactly what it sounds like.

Teams hit the frigid waters of the Saint Lawrence
river with their canoes and race through a
mix of ice, slush and water.

Originally, a means of winter transport, ice
canoeing has become a sport for the bold and

Having had the chance to try this ourselves
we had some serious respect for the teams
Here is a look at this legendary event.
